sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with re fei 熱痱 , heat with seething rash. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 138: 熱氣內郁 於皮腠之間， 輕則為痱，重則為痤也 , “When heat qi enters and is pent-up internally in the region of the skin interstices, in light cases this is seething rash ; in severe cases this develops into acne”. Fei bao 痱皰 , seething rash with blisters [1]

Pathological Condition identical with re fei 熱痱 , heat with seething rash. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shi hui 石 灰 quotes Jin xiao fang 近效方 : 夏月痱皰：石灰煅一兩，蛤粉二兩，甘草一兩，研，撲之, “For seething rash with blisters during the summer months: [use] shi hui , heat prepared, 1 liang ; ge fen , 2 liang ; gan cao , 1 liang , all ground to a powder, to attack it”.
